title: Diary of the Displaced - Omnibus - Glynn James
description:
The Omnibus Edition of Books 1-3

Includes all 62 episodes in the first series

Book 1 - The Journal of James Halldon (Episodes 1-24) 
Book 2 - The Broken Lands (Episodes 25-43) 
Book 3 - The Ways (Episodes 44-62)

James Halldon wakes up in a strange and dark place, surrounded by endless junk and debris. 
He has no idea where he is, or how he got there. 
No food. 
No water. 
No light. 
Almost no memories of his past. 
And there are things moving in the darkness around him. Things that growl. 
And daytime never seems to come...

From the Back Cover

James Halldon wakes up in a strange and dark place, surrounded by endless junk and debris. 

He has no idea where he is, or how he got there. 

No food. 

No water. 

No light. 

Almost no memories of his past. 

And there are things moving in the darkness around him. Things that growl. 

And daytime never seems to come...
